item.title: Citations and Sources
item.description:
Sources and Citations

This page is for hosting the sources for all of the images used on this website.

Homepage

Image of trail through forest: “Long Forest Trail” by TSP-Photo is marked with Public Domain Mark 1.0. To view the terms, visit https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/?ref=openverse.

item.title: Marathon History
item.description: This is a list of all of the marathons I’ve completed so far. I have also run a handful of other races like half marathons, 10 miles races, and 5ks. I attempted a 50 mile race (the JFK50) but had to DNF because of an injury. Part of the goal of this site is to help me prepare for the shorter ultramarathon (50k) that I am running in October 2025. Once I have that under my belt, I will hopefully be able tackle longer distances.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
My name is Elizabeth and I am runner in the Washington DC area. I love all of the trails and opportunities to explore. You might not know it, but Washington DC and the surrounding beltway area has amazing running trails and a vibrant running community! My favorite style of running is trail running, but I end up running on pavement most of the time.

Goals for the Future

My current goal is to complete the Sky to Summit ultramarathon in October of this year! It will certainly be a challenge. The elevation difference between where I live and the race is impressive, but so is the elevation change in the race itself. However, with the right training plan and nutrition I believe I will see the finish line.
